articles.title: Priyanka Chopra gets candid about botched early 2000s surgery - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 40-year-old actress - who attended the Met Gala with husband Nick Jonas on Monday - got candid about about the removal of a polyp in her nasal cavity that went wrong during a recent appearance on SiriusXM's The Howard Stern Show.
